pattern_it_incident_001.name: Incident Management
pattern_it_incident_001.description: IT incident reporting, triage, investigation, resolution, and closure workflow
examples: User reports issue, IT triages and assigns severity, critical issues escalated for immediate investigation, resolution tested and verified before closure
Incident logged, prioritized by impact, high-severity incidents prioritized, root cause investigation, fix implementation, user verification, ticket closed
validation_rules: Incident must be triaged within 1 hour
Resolution must be verified by end user

pattern_it_change_001.name: Change Management
pattern_it_change_001.description: Change request submission, review, approval, implementation, and validation process
examples: Change request submitted, impact assessed and reviewed by CAB, approved changes planned and implemented, tested in staging, deployed to production, monitored for issues
IT change initiated, risk assessment, approval process, implementation planning, testing phase, production deployment, post-deployment monitoring

pattern_it_deployment_001.name: Software Deployment
pattern_it_deployment_001.description: Release planning, build validation, staged deployment, and verification workflow
examples: Release planned, code built and validated, deployed to staging, tested thoroughly, then deployed to production with monitoring
Deployment planning, artifact build, validation checks, staging environment deployment, UAT, production rollout, health monitoring
validation_rules: All builds must pass automated tests

pattern_it_access_001.name: Access Request Management
pattern_it_access_001.description: Employee access request submission, review, approval, and provisioning workflow
examples: Employee requests system access, request verified against employee status, security review for least privilege, approved if compliant, access provisioned, verified working
Access request submitted, manager validation, security approval, provisioning of credentials, user verification of access

pattern_it_backup_001.name: Backup and Recovery
pattern_it_backup_001.description: Regular backup scheduling, verification, and disaster recovery testing
examples: Backup scheduled daily, runs automatically, backup integrity verified, files cataloged, quarterly restore tests, documentation updated, ongoing monitoring
Scheduled backup execution, verification of backup completeness, backup catalog maintenance, DR testing, documentation of procedures

pattern_it_security_audit_001.name: Security Audit and Compliance
pattern_it_security_audit_001.description: Periodic security assessments, vulnerability scanning, and compliance verification
examples: Annual security audit planned, vulnerability scanning performed, assessment conducted, vulnerabilities identified and reported, remediation actions taken, retesting done, compliance certified
Security audit scheduled, system scanning, vulnerability assessment, findings documented, remediation tracking, verification of fixes, compliance sign-off

pattern_it_network_001.name: Network Infrastructure Change
pattern_it_network_001.description: Network modification planning, implementation, testing, and documentation
examples: Network change designed and reviewed, tested in lab environment, implemented during maintenance window, connectivity validated, monitored for performance, documentation updated
Network design, lab testing, production implementation, validation of connections, performance monitoring, procedure documentation
